text: Cremona is a city in northern Italy. Cremona is in the Lombardy Region with a population of 71,533 inhabitants. It is in the Po Valley on the North side of the Po River. == History == In the year 218 BCE, Romans founded the city. Before that, it was a village of the Gauls. ==References== Category:3rd- century BC establishments Category:Capital cities in Italy
title: Cremona
